about_the_game:
Upgrade your arsenal with a stunning new look in Strayed! The Oil Slick Green skin pack brings a unique, iridescent finish to your weapons, making each piece glisten with metallic shades of green and purple that shift in the light. This skin pack is perfect for players who want to survive on the islands in style!

Purchasing this multi-weapon skin pack allows for the Oil Slick Green skin to be applied to all of the following weapons:

- M16

- AK

- F8

- SMG

- BOLT ACTION SHOTGUN

- MILITARY PISTOL

- M1 GARAND
